resources.string: On this activity the user will interact with a list of artists. Clicking on one of these entries would bring the user to another list activity. To implement this I would need some functionality that will scan the user\'s phone for media files and lists them together using their meta data. I would also need to be able to create a new Activity for each individual artist.

On this activity the user will interact with a list of albums. Clicking on one of these entries would bring the user to another list activity. To implement this I would need some functionality that will scan the user\'s phone for media files and lists them together using their meta data. I would also need to be able to create a new Activity for each individual album.

On this activity the user will interact with a list of playlist. Clicking on one of these entries would bring the user to another list activity. To implement this I would need some functionality that will scan the user\'s phone for media files and lists them together using their meta data. I would also need to be able to create a new Activity for each individual album.

On this activity the user will interact with a list of songs. Clicking on one of these entries will make that song the now playing song. To implement this I would need some functionality that will scan the user\'s phone for media files and lists them together using their meta data. I would also need to be able to play a media file, I could use the Media Playback API.

This page shows which song is currently playing or paused. It will have the controls: start, stop, skip, and previous. I will need to use the Media Playback API and also implement some code to get the buttons working correctly.
